preparing research / analysis for votes
tracking legislation

other duties as assigned

key_responsibilities: None
requirements: Hill experience a plus, not required

developing and advancing legislation and other policy priorities of the Member

drafting constituent correspondence

able to multi-task and thrive in a fast paced environment
poise, patience and a sense of humor

writing weekly newsletters, OpEds
maintaining and updating website content

establishing and maintaining strong relations with district and DC media and executing an aggressive earned local media campaign

responding promptly to media inquiries
effectively messaging policy and other priorities
